analysis.parsing
Class Tuple

java.lang.Object
  analysis.parsing.Tuple

public class Tuple
extends java.lang.Object

The tuple used in Earley's algorithm, consisting of a production index, a dot position at the production, a state, ahead strings and father tuples.

Author:
XZW
